text: Wabaxolela kananjalo nabanye abathathu15 (abaye basala ngasemva abaya edabini) emveni kokuba wathi umhlaba ungaka ukuba banzi, wasuka wacutheka kubo, nabo buqu (baziva) becuthekile baqonda kananjalo okokuba akukho ukubaleka kuAllâh, kungekho lukhuseleko ngaphandle kolwaKhe. Wabaxolela ke khona ukuze bakwazi ukucela ukuxolelwa NguYe. Inene uAllâh nguYe Oxolelayo Amkele inguquko, nguSozinceba
